Header: JVP likely to lose 300 Local Government Authority seats
Content: MP Sisira Jayakody from the Joint Opposition says that every political party would lose its many LG seats if the number of council members is counted according to the Local Government Election Act. Speaking to our news team, he said that the JVP would lose the most number of seats. Meanwhile, a discussion regarding, 25% female representation will be held at the National Election Commission today (Mar. 02). The Minister of Provincial Councils and Local Government Faizer Mustapha, members of the Election Commission, Female Media Collective and members of several civic organizations are scheduled to participate in this meeting.
